title: (x) Axon-Kitchenworks rounded tech sans - Storno {Ganesh (self)}
content:
In use on [www.axon-kitchenworks.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503010620/http:/www.axon-kitchenworks.com/ "www.axon-kitchenworks.com")

author: ganesh

comments.content: ....couple threads with this font, but no luck. maybe custom.

Hi, this is a tricky one, discussed a few days before in here: [http://typophile.com/node/14859](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503010620/http:/typophile.com/node/14859 "http://typophile.com/node/14859").

Better luck for you...

Jorge Marcedo  
Coimbra | Portugal

It reminds me a face by Lineto, you can check [http://www.lineto.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503010620/http:/www.lineto.com/ "http://www.lineto.com").

Regards,  
AS

Thanks all.  
Frank Rocholl, the designer of the site, was kind enough to answer by mail....  
Its STORNO by Lineto. Bravo Alessandro!  
It keeps happening more and more. I am sitting on my huge and evergrowing forest of fonts.... cant see single trees anymore...getting older too : )
